question: best ammo+best ammunition+best caliber+common ammo+common ammunition+easy to find ammo+tapper ammunition+one tap ammo+tapper ammo
answer: There are multiple stats to compare in order to determine which is the best ammunition in DayZ, but on a general note, 7.62x54mmR is the best, as it's pretty common to find and packs a serious punch. Next would be .308.

question: Mosin ammo+mosin nagant ammo+mosin nagant ammunition+mosin ammunition
answer: Mosin uses 7.62x54mmR ammunition. It is not only best in terms of damage, but also very common to find. Can be found in any of the following areas: Farm, Hunting, Town, Village.

question: VSD ammo+dragunov ammo+dragunov ammunition+vsd ammunition+svd ammo+svd ammunition+svd dragunov ammo+svd dragunov ammunition
answer: VSD uses 7.62x54mmR ammunition. It is not only best in terms of damage, but also very common to find. Can be found in any of the following areas: Farm, Hunting, Town, Village.

question: ammo types+ammo+ammo in dayz+ammunition+all ammo types+all ammo+calibers+ammo category
answer: Ammo types found in DayZ: 9x19mm, .357, .45 ACP, .380 ACP, .308 WIN, .22 LR, Flare, 12ga, 5.56x45mm, 5.45x39mm, 7.62x39mm, 9x39mm.
